articles.title: Chinese-Canadian ex-pop star Kris Wu sentenced to 13 years in jail for rape - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: A 19 year-old student last year accused the former member of the K-pop group EXO of date-raping her when she was 17. Wu was sentenced after being found guilty by a court in Beijing's Chaoyang district on Friday (Nov 25).
articles.content:
Chinese-Canadian ex-pop star Kris Wu has been jailed for 13 years after being found guilty of rape, a Chinese court said Friday (Nov 25).

articles.description: White Jacket has designed for some of the world’s most exclusive hotel brands including Intercontinental, JW Marriott and Shangri-La. Its founder, Patricia Ho Douven, tells CNA Women how she built her dream company, one sharp business move at a time.
